title: BRING BACK ONE FOR ALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I believe that One for All was a great game mode. It is so much fun to play with friends as you can have so many laughs. Im sure that people already do enjoy the game modes that are available to us now but I believe One for All was a unique game mode that everyone enjoyed. So many people loved it and I think it should be permanent and not limited time only! Anyone else agree??

replies.body: Mundo will go when he pleases! and so will gamemodes.
I didn't like it in yolo q. Very rarely got to play fun champs.
